name: Flightcontrol
headline: Deploy apps with utmost reliability, flexibility, and performance
description: The most reliable, powerful, and flexible PaaS, because we deploy to your AWS. No black box, lock-in, or AWS markups.

founders.name: Brandon Bayer, Founder
founders.description:
CEO & Cofounder Flightcontrol | Creator of Blitz.js
Outside of work I love flying airplanes and helicopters, rock climbing, tennis, riding my unicycle, and reading books

# Say goodbye to reliabilityand scaling problems
  * Flightcontrol is a PaaS that deploys to your AWS account
  * Servers, Lambdas, workers, crons, static sites, databases & Redis
  * We are your devops team with 24/7 emergency support
  * Companies outgrowing other PaaS or homegrown AWS switch to Flightcontrol to regain reliability, security, and scalability at a reasonable cost


[Start free trial](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/app.flightcontrol.dev/signup>)[Get a demo](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/www.flightcontrol.dev/demo>)
![Flightcontrol Dashboard](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/_next/image?url=%2FheroImage.png&w=1920&q=75)
## $1 million of AWS resources under management
![cal.com logo](https://www.datocms-assets.com/98758/1716559487-cal-logo-1.svg)![cascade PBS logo](https://www.datocms-assets.com/98758/1716506661-cascade-logo.svg)![drive.com.au logo](https://www.datocms-assets.com/98758/1716506665-drive-logo.svg)![Webgears logo](https://www.datocms-assets.com/98758/1716390279-webgears-2.svg)![productlane](https://www.datocms-assets.com/98758/1716389963-productlane-2.svg)![echo/bind company logo](https://www.datocms-assets.com/98758/1698946123-echo-bind.svg)![Flick company logo](https://www.datocms-assets.com/98758/1698946117-flick.svg)![goHappy logo](https://www.datocms-assets.com/98758/1698946202-gohappy.png)![Remi company logo](https://www.datocms-assets.com/98758/1698946102-remi.svg)
## Serve all your use-cases from a single platform
Static Sites
CloudFront + S3 + Lambda@Edge
Web & GPU Servers
ECS + Fargate or EC2 + CloudFront CDN
Private Servers
ECS + Fargate or EC2
Background Workers
ECS + Fargate or EC2
New
Lambda
Serverless functions
Job Scheduler
Cron jobs & ad-hoc commands via ECS
Databases
Postgres, MySQL, MariaDB via RDS
Redis
Via ElastiCache
> Without FlightControl it would simply not have been possible for our company to begin the migration process to AWS. They simplify so much of the AWS experience which allows primarily frontend developers such as myself to focus more on code and less on infrastructure.
Thomas Kovacs, Software Architect
|
Webgears
> “Flightcontrol offers a nice balance between batteries-included and escape hatches that I haven't seen elsewhere. Keep up the good work and let us know if you need anything!”
Matt Davis, Head of Technology
|
Spring Studios
> Said it before but gonna shout it out again. Flightcontrol is the best PaaS on the market hands down. As a FE Lead who does not want to worry about devops its 100% worth the price.
Aaron Rackley, Front-end Lead
|
Wedtech
> We've been migrating our Rails app off of Heroku and onto AWS via Flightcontrol. The team is AWESOME and have built an excellent product. So good. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Joel Hooks, CEO
|
Egghead
> Nothing else compares for balance between control, flexibility and simplicity. A perfect fit for us. For our multiple locale deployments, 3-5 million monthly page views, use case, the Flightcontrol team were incredibly helpful in getting us setup + ensuring we understood what we had. 10/10
Tim Booker, COO
|
Lineup Publishing
> Two large SaaS businesses I’m involved in have all deployed on Flightcontrol for years, and have had no issues. Infra devops cut down to zero! Deploying and scaling infra has been a dream. I can’t imagine why anyone in their sane mind not try Flightcontrol
Andreas Asprou, CTO
|
Flick & Dweet
> I've been using Flightcontrol for a long time, and I've never had a product that's given me better support. They have been so awesome and easy to work with. Being able to deploy things using AWS credits made a lot of things possible for me what weren't on other platforms.
Leo Guinan, Founder
|
Multiple
> We're using Flightcontrol at Productlane and love it. We moved from Fly.io to Railway to Flightcontrol and finally found the right platform for us that works reliably and didn't have random downtime.
Raphael Fleckenstein, CEO
|
Productlane
> We're using Flightcontrol at Tono Health and it has completely solved our lack of devops expertise. With the new CI build runners, it also cut our build time in HALF compared to GitHub Actions. We're so happy with Flightcontrol
Ethan Cohen, CTO
|
Tono Health
## Why your AWS? Because you get superior price-performance-reliability
AWS has its flaws, but it's world-class at reliability and flexibility. With Flightcontrol you get the best of both worlds, great developer experience and utmost reliability and performance.
Flightcontrol| Render| Railway| Fly| Vercel  
---|---|---|---|---  
Infra incidentsover 90 days| [1](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/health.aws.amazon.com/health/status>)| [11](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/status.render.com>)| [18](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/status.railway.app>)| [39](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/status.flyio.net/>)| [24](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/www.vercel-status.com/>)  
Compute cost for2 CPU / 4 GB| [$27 burstable](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/instances.vantage.sh/aws/ec2/t3a.medium>)[$56 sustained](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/instances.vantage.sh/aws/ec2/c6a.large>)reserved| [$85](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/render.com/pricing>)| [$80](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/railway.app/pricing>)| [$62](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/fly.io/pricing>)| n/a  
Largest compute| [448 CPU24 TB](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/instances.vantage.sh/aws/ec2/u-24tb1.112xlarge>)| [8 CPU/32 GBEnterprise:64 CPU/512 GB](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/render.com/pricing>)| [32 CPU/32 GBEnterprise:custom](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/railway.app/pricing>)| [16 CPU/128 GB](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/fly.io/pricing>)| 1.7 CPU/3 GB  
Regions| [28](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/awsregion.info/>)| [5](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/docs.render.com/regions>)| [4](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/docs.railway.app/reference/regions>)| [35](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/fly.io/docs/reference/regions>)| [18](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/vercel.com/docs/edge-network/regions#region-list>)  
Fully managed, ship fast  
CDN for compute  
Static sites  
GPUs  
HIPAA eligible| Enterprise only| Enterprise only  
Customize underlying infra  
API| Basic| Full| Full| Full| Full  
Protocols besides http| (private server only)  
Updated 2024-08-12
## 2-6x faster builds than any other platform
We engineered a custom build system that uses an EC2 builder in your account for maximum performance and ultra low cost. And you have full control over the instance size.
Flightcontrol| Render| Railway| Fly| Vercel  
---|---|---|---|---  
Initial provisioning| 10m| 0m| 0m| 1m| 0m  
Clean build(for [Cal.com](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/github.com/calcom/cal.com>))| 11m 30s| 9m| 19m| 19m| 20m 30s  
Cached build(for [Cal.com](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/github.com/calcom/cal.com>))| 3m 35s| 7m 30s| 16m 15s|  15m 40s| 15m 20s  
Deploy time(for [Cal.com](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/github.com/calcom/cal.com>))| 3m 30s| 4m| 4m| 45s| 30s  
Updated 2024-08-12
> “Flightcontrol is excellent devops tooling that would take time and dedicated devops engineers to build at many companies. We're very glad we found Flightcontrol. It's an amazing value for us.”
Dylan, CTO & Co-founder
|
Boardwalk Marketing
> “It's saving so much time and headache for me and my team. Keep up the good work, we love your product!”
Johan, CTO
|
xNomad
> "Flightcontrol has been a dream, and their level of support has been off the charts. I switched from Lambda to get GPU support and got magnitudes better performance at a fraction of the cost for my AI Video company."
Daniel, Founder
|
QuickVid
> “Flightcontrol is the real deal. I think this is the future for teams that don't have resources for SREs but still want control of their infra.”
Thomas, Co-founder
|
Unrevealed
Visual Config? Code config? Both!
Infrastructure-as-code designed for moving fast
![An interface showing visual config and code config side by side](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F98758%2F1699276422-visual-config-min.png%3Ffit%3Dcrop%26q%3D90&w=3840&q=75)
Deploy close to your users
Choose today from 28 AWS regions. Multi-region deploys in early access.
![A worldmap showing edge locations](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F98758%2F1699276174-world-map-min.png%3Ffit%3Dcrop%26q%3D90&w=3840&q=75)
Observability
Stay on top of things with our metrics and alerts, or add sidecars like Datadog.
![An interface showing server metrics](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F98758%2F1699276186-observability-min.png%3Ffit%3Dcrop%26q%3D90&w=2048&q=75)
Nixpacks
Build any language or framework without writing a Dockerfile. The modern successor to Heroku buildpacks.
Stale while revalidate + Next.js & Svelte ISR
Blazing fast speed with CloudFront's stale-while-revalidate support
AWS cost transparency
Understand exactly where the dollars are going by project, environment, and service.
![An interface showing AWS cost](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F98758%2F1716389048-cost-transparency.png%3Ffit%3Dcrop%26q%3D90&w=1200&q=75)
Preview environments, fullstack
Deploy your all your services for every pull request to a cost optimized environment. 
Bring your monoliths and your microservices
Your architecture will work with us, no matter how big or small.
Your domain, with https
Connect your domain with a couple DNS records. No messing with SSL certificates.
Peak edge performance
World-class performance with CloudFront, Stale-While-Revalidate, and edge-based Next.js ISR. Even multi-region.
Monorepos, with watch paths
Put all your stuff in one place, that's fine with us. And only deploy changed files with watch paths.
Maintenance mode
Block traffic to your app while you're doing something important (we assume).
API & deploy hooks
Trigger deploys from CI. More thorough API is coming, we promise.
Notifications
Get alerted in Slack or email when things go south. Or when they go north.
Rollback
It happens to the best of us, so we've got your back when the inevitable happens.
Private VPC networking
Each environment is deployed to a new or existing VPC. Get private services and private databases.
## Deploy every language globally 
Every language and framework works beautifully in the Flightcontrol universe. Welcome home.
## 1. Connect your AWS and GitHub with 1-click
Everything is deployed to your AWS account where you have full ownership and control. Without the frustrating limitations of black box PaaS.
![Select a repo, try a demo and connect AWS account](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F98758%2F1706541367-selectrepo.png%3Ffit%3Dcrop%26q%3D90&w=1920&q=75)
## 2. Zero-config or customize to your heart's content
It will often "just work", but we also support many customizations like pulling from image registries or fine-tuning autoscaling.
![Set up services, choose from presets](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F98758%2F1699390862-addservices.png%3Ffit%3Dcrop%26q%3D90&w=3840&q=75)
## 3. Automatic deploys with git push or webhook
Fully automated infra provisioning, builds and deploys. All without having to use the AWS console.
![See service metrics and deployments](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F98758%2F1699390892-servicesdeployments.png%3Ffit%3Dcrop%26q%3D90&w=3840&q=75)
### Trusted by thousands of developers
We've got your back with the most helpful, responsive support in the industry
### Enterprise grade no matter your size
Customers of all sizes rely on us for production, from startups to large enterprises
### Save a fortune on devops costs
We delay the need for infra engineers by a few years. And then we enable them to focus on more meaningful work
## You're moments away from launch
You're going to love this
[Start free with Google](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/app.flightcontrol.dev/api/auth/google/login?oAuthAction=signUp>)[Start free with GitHub](https://www.flightcontrol.dev/<https:/app.flightcontrol.dev/api/auth/github/login?oAuthAction=signUp>)

generated_description:
Flightcontrol is a cloud computing startup focused on making application deployment easier and more reliable. Founded in 2021 and a proud member of Y Combinator's W22 batch, this Ohio-based company champions its mission to deploy apps with top-notch reliability and performance, directly onto your AWS infrastructure. This means no black boxes, no vendor lock-in, and no hidden markups from AWS. For developers feeling bogged down by operational issues, Flightcontrol presents itself as the solution.

At its core, Flightcontrol is a Platform as a Service (PaaS) that allows users to deploy a variety of services—be it servers, Lambdas, cron jobs, static sites, or databases—entirely within their AWS account. It provides a comprehensive devops team backup, available 24/7, aiming to regain the reliability and scalability companies often lose when they outgrow simpler platforms like Heroku. Many customers have hailed the seamless transition and support they've received while migrating to Flightcontrol from other platforms.

Boasting a small yet dedicated team of six, led by Group Partner Diana Hu, they successfully manage an impressive $1 million in AWS resources. Testimonies from various tech leaders underline the platform's balance of control, flexibility, and simplicity—making it a prime pick for software developers across the board.

In a nutshell, if you're tired of wrestling with infrastructure headaches while wanting extensive control, Flightcontrol puts your applications on AWS and allows you to focus on what you do best—writing code.

For those eager to explore more, their official site is [Flightcontrol.dev](https://www.flightcontrol.dev?ref=bookface) where you can kickstart your deployment journey—free of charge.
